hooks.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE=$(echo $INPUT | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // empty"); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "(next\.config|supabase/migrations|backend/src/config/database)"; then echo "CRITICAL FILE: $FILE - requires orchestrator approval" >&2; exit 2; fi; exit 0'
bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE=$(echo $INPUT | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // empty"); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "\.(ts|tsx)$"; then pnpm exec eslint "$FILE" --fix 2>/dev/null || true; fi'
bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); CMD=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.command // empty"); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE "git commit"; then /home/user/ITM-gd/.claude/tsc-check-commit.sh; fi; exit 0'
